@muraii --user option should work for any recent pip / easy_install and python ≥ 2.6. if it doesn't work, per-user installation of python packages can be done this way: 1) export PYTHONPATH=~/.local/lib/python2.6/site-packages (put it in your .bashrc) 2) python setup.py install --prefix ~/.local
@muraii and you can always fall back to the system-wide installation: sudo python setup.py install :)
